Header: Libya attack: ‘Dozens killed in air strike’ on migrant centre
Content: At least 40 people have been killed by an air strike that hit a migrant detention centre in Libya. Another 80 are reported to have been wounded in the explosion, which happened at a facility in an eastern suburb of the capital, Tripoli. The majority of those killed are reported to be African migrants. In recent years, Libya has been a key springboard for migrants seeking to travel to Europe. The country has been torn by violence and division since long-time ruler Muammar Gaddafi was deposed and killed in 2011.
